text: Ama korosti qasaalayiy girâ marih xagarak caxita guq haak yanxuqem gabbataah, kaa yanxuqem maxayyoysaay ma duuda qeeroo kee niqnâ gibdah, rabi edde yan digaalay gibdi kulli aracak kaat tamaateeh, usuk raba numuy digaalak yaffoofe hinna, usuk ama digaalah lakat teetik gidibuk raqta digaalay kaa qansarissa le
